title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define project scope, objectives, and requirements for the neural interface system. Conduct research and gather input from stakeholders, including medical professionals, prosthetics experts, and potential users.

title: System Architecture Design for Neural Interface System - REVISED
description: Revised version of the task: Develop the overall architecture and design for the neural interface system of advanced bionic prosthetics, focusing on intuitive control and sensory feedback. The architecture should be modular, allowing for easy replacement or upgrade of individual components, and incorporate AI and machine learning algorithms to improve control and feedback. Key considerations include hardware and software components, data flow, integration with existing prosthetic devices, security, scalability, maintainability, user experience, regulatory compliance, a plan for continuous improvement, and the use of agile methodologies throughout the development process. Upon completion, the design will serve as the foundation for the development of this project. This RFC is now ready for review.

title: Neural Signal Processing
description: Implement algorithms and techniques for acquiring, processing, and interpreting neural signals from the user's nervous system.

title: Prosthetic Device Integration
description: Develop interfaces and communication protocols to seamlessly integrate the neural interface system with various types of bionic prosthetics.

title: User Interface and Feedback
description: Design and implement user interfaces and feedback mechanisms to provide intuitive control and sensory feedback to the user.

title: Security and Privacy
description: Implement robust security measures to protect user data and ensure the privacy and integrity of the neural interface system.

title: Testing and Validation
description: Develop comprehensive testing strategies and validation procedures to ensure the reliability, safety, and performance of the neural interface system.

title: Deployment and Support
description: Plan and implement strategies for deploying the neural interface system in various healthcare and research settings, and provide ongoing support and maintenance.

title: Documentation and Training
description: Create comprehensive documentation, user guides, and training materials to support the adoption and proper use of the neural interface system.
